page.title: 08EVERYDAY WORK & TIMES
page.content: My Dad works as a{part-time {contractor}on farms. In Winter, he {snow ploughs}for the County Council, but he is only allowed to do this when the snow is at least 1.5 inches deep. The tractor he uses is a John Deene 3040 with a 3 metre snow plough attachment. At the moment, my Dad is {spraying;}he uses the same tractor and a Hardi TZ1000 21 metre sprayer. When he is travelling down lanes, he knocks all the branches with the booms because they are so high. During the{Summer}holidays, he will be combining for different farmers, as well as ourselves. We have got a New Holland 8060 Combine, which has a 4 metre bed, and a corn weigher fitted on the spout. There is a computer in the cab to calculate the grain per hectare. { $ # $ # $ # $ # $ # $ # $ # $
